      #include <stdio.h>

      int main() {
          int x, y;
          scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);

          int diff = y - x;
          int mod = diff % 3;
          if (mod < 0) mod += 3;
          int add = (mod > 0) ? 1 : 0;
          int temp = x + y - 3 + add;
          int result = (temp < 0) ? 0 : temp;

          printf("%d\n", result);
      }
